title: Zimbabwe's first poll since Mugabe set for July
text:
Zimbabwe's first poll since Mugabe set for July 5:28pm BST - 01:20
Zimbabwe's President Emmerson Mnangagwa has announced that a general election will be held on July 30 - a vote that could be crucial to securing foreign investment
Zimbabwe's President Emmerson Mnangagwa has announced that a general election will be held on July 30 - a vote that could be crucial to securing foreign investment //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/05/30/zimbabwes-first-poll-since-mugabe-set-fo?videoId=431704877&videoChannel=13422
